about_the_game:
Try a hard Gang life

Being in the real Gang isn’t easy. Take your friends and try to rob an Art Gallery or a Bank. You’re not stealing; you’re simply borrowing, whether for a short or long period. You decide. But remember – take the most precious and run!



…or try one day in Police

It’s even harder to fight the Gangs. You can try, so grab your weapons and create bullet mayhem! Prevent the robberies with your friends – counterattack the Gangs. Maybe you want to kick someone’s butt with a baton?



Enjoy lazy, cozy days at the Police Station

Don’t let those troublesome Gangs ruin your perfect day! Control the situation in your Town – answer the emergency calls and protect. Fight back, and make them long for a moment of respite in a windowless room


Real Gangsters wear real stuff

You are unique, so choose your style, and everyone will recognize you in the Town. No matter if you are on the Gang or Police side.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x86 and x64
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6750 (2 * 2660) or equivalent | AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 6000+ (2 * 3000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x86 and x64
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Quad Q9300 (4 * 2500) or equivalent | AMD A10-5800K APU (4*3800) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: SOS OPS 2 is an engaging multiplayer co-op PvP game about the hard life of the Robbers and Policemen. Choose your side, team up with friends, and steal something or fight the Gangs!
